## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-11.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-9.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there is enough space and no obstructions when placing entities. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or adjusting the reference position to avoid collisions with existing entities.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source items are available for inserters to pick up. Regularly check and maintain the supply of source items to avoid waiting states.

### Not Enough Iron Ore in Inventory
- Maintain a sufficient inventory of iron ore to supply furnaces consistently. Regularly check and replenish the iron ore stock to avoid production halts.
